sources.title: Law of the Underworld
sources.description: Title: Law of the Underworld Summary: A respected citizen with secret ties to the local mob is faced with revealing his criminal connections to save two innocent people from execution. Directed by: Lew Landers Actors: Chester Morris, Anne Shirley, Eduardo Ciannelli Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 6 May 1938 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A respected citizen with secret ties to the local mob is faced with revealing his criminal connections to save two innocent people from execution.

sources.title: Law of the Underworld (1938) CHESTER MORRIS
sources.description:
Stars: Chester Morris, Anne Shirley, Eduardo Ciannelli
Director: Lew Landers

A respected citizen with secret ties to the mob is faced with revealing his criminal connections in order to save two innocents from execution!

metadata.Plot: A respected citizen with secret ties to the local mob is faced with revealing his criminal connections to save two innocent people from execution.
metadata.Writer: Bert Granet, Edmund L. Hartmann, John B. Hymer
metadata.Actors: Chester Morris, Anne Shirley, Eduardo Ciannelli
